des:
With the popularity of smart phones and the Internet of Things, traditional lighting is gradually moving toward smart lighting, providing intelligent detection and sensing capabilities, which in turn enhance people’s quality of life. With more environmentally-friendly LED lighting and countries that have promoted green energy and smart buildings, smart lighting has gradually moved from industrial and commercial buildings, government units, and public buildings to general communities and homes, providing more power and wisdom. Create more atmosphere to improve people's living quality.
Traditional lighting, the main function is to provide light in the dark, so that people can carry out various activities in places with insufficient lighting. However, “light color” affects people’s daily life and mood, so new buildings all take lighting design into consideration. Different lighting levels and color temperatures are used in various locations to create different designs to enhance the quality of homes, increase the number of business-to-business venues, and gather together public buildings.

With the increasing demand for colorful lighting to create different ambiences, light sculpture design has become a must-have element for a new generation of buildings. Through a variety of light colors, different atmospheres can be created to facilitate the attraction of more The crowds, and then brought in the tide of money.

Most of the traditional lighting control methods are based on fixed-site switches. In recent years, with the popularity of smart phones and the trend of the Internet of Things, new generations of lighting are moving toward intelligence, which can be combined with sensing devices and information management platforms. With the Internet, lighting and living environment will be integrated to achieve "wisdom lighting" applications.

Compared with traditional lighting, smart lighting can provide people with remote monitoring of these lighting devices through mobile devices, and can change the light color according to their mood to create a different atmosphere environment, and even further can detect whether people are on the scene Sensed on-site physical and mental state of the people, to automatically open and close or adjust the light brightness, color temperature and other capabilities, in order to create a more appropriate and more humane comfortable lighting space.
